name: Black History Month: Interactive Collage
description:
Celebrate Black History Month by honoring over 200 influential people involved in the liberation, civil rights, and modernization of Blacks and African descent with this interactive click-and-drag collage of 250 photos. The placement of these photos are randomly set by a three-layer algorithm. Each playthrough will be different as you listen to Martin Luther King Jr.'s "I Have a Dream" speech given at the pool of the Washington Monument in the United States of America.

Or download the zip file and navigate to the photos folder and view the photos without MLK's speech and random placement. Or perhaps play the audio file of MLK's speech while viewing the photos. Or just listen to MLK's speech.

February is Black History Month in the United States.
